5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to perform two Rak’ah before Fajr, and he used to say: ‘The best two Surah to recite in the two Rak’ah of Fajr are: “Say: Allah is One” [Al-Ikhlas (112)] and “Say: O you disbelievers.” [Al-Kafirun]

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَا يَقْرَأُ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ قَبْلَ الْفَجْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning what is to be recited in the two Rak’ah before Fajr
